applyCode.title: Apply a code
applyCode.introduction: Bloom works with partners to support healing for survivors of abuse around the world.
applyCode.description: If you've received an access code from one of our partners, you can add it here to receive support specific to their programme.
applyCode.descriptionLine2: You can add codes from more than one partner.
applyCode.partnershipsDescription: Read more about our partnerships by clicking on their logo.
applyCode.formIntroduction: Enter the access code you received from a Bloom partner.

formSuccess.success: A Bumble code was applied to your account!
formSuccess.successLine2: Your Bumble access enables the following:

form.assignPartnerAccessError: There was an error applying the code to your account. Try again later and <contactLink>message the Bloom team</contactLink> if you're still getting this error.

codeErrors.internal: There was an error validating your access code. Try again later and <contactLink>message the Bloom team</contactLink> if you're still getting this error.
codeErrors.expired: This code has expired. Get in touch with the partner's team.
codeErrors.invalid: Your access code appears to be invalid. Check for typos or get in touch with the partner.
codeErrors.alreadyInUse: This code has already been used. If you think there's been a mistake, get in touch with the partner's team.
codeErrors.alreadyApplied: This code has already been applied to your account.

aboutYou.title: About you
aboutYou.description: These questions help us understand who is using Bloom and what kinds of support they need from us.
aboutYou.descriptionALine1: Thank you for your answers so far!
aboutYou.descriptionALine2: As a new user, we'd like to understand how you're doing before using our services. Asking this now helps us to measure the impact that using Bloom is having for survivors, and helps us focus on the right things.

demographicForm.genderLabel: Please select one or more options that reflect your gender identity
demographicForm.genderHelpText: We are asking this to better understand how our users identify, with a view to designing even more inclusive and gender-affirming resources. You can select 'Prefer not to answer'.
demographicForm.neurodivergentLabel: Would you describe yourself as neurodivergent?
demographicForm.neurodivergentHelpText: We design our services to be inclusive, so it’s helpful for us to hear feedback from people who are neurodivergent
demographicForm.raceEthnNatnLabel: How would you describe your race, ethnicity and nationality? E.g., White Hispanic Mexican, or Tamil Indian.
demographicForm.raceEthnNatnHelpText: We know that people's experiences of race and ethnicity vary widely based on where they live, so write what you feel best describes you personally.
demographicForm.countryLabel: What country do you live in right now?
demographicForm.countryHelpText: This will help us understand where survivors are accessing our services from.

baseForm.scaleDescriptionLine1: Please rate your level of agreement with the following statements:

scaleLabels.Q1: I understand how the trauma I experienced has affected my mind, body and emotions
scaleLabels.Q2: I know that there are coping mechanisms that don’t help me in the long term, and that feeling drawn to these can be a normal response to trauma
scaleLabels.Q3: I know that it takes time, energy and patience to heal
scaleLabels.Q4: I’m committed to giving myself the attention that I need to heal
scaleLabels.Q5: I have found the things that make me feel good, and make time for them in my routine
scaleLabels.Q6: I understand that part of healing from trauma is dealing with triggers
scaleLabels.Q7: I understand that what makes make me feel safe or threatened is unique to me
scaleLabels.Q8: I can anticipate and cope with triggering moments, places or times of year

setAForm.hopesLabel: What’s one thing that you’re hoping Bloom will help you to understand or do?

disableServiceEmails.title: Bloom emails turned off
disableServiceEmails.description: You will no longer receive emails related to Bloom. If you'd like to change this later, please <link>get in touch with the Bloom team.</link>
disableServiceEmails.error: There was an error turning off emails from Bloom. Try again by refreshing this page, or <link>get in touch with the Bloom team.</link>

accountSettings.title: Account Settings
accountSettings.description: View and update your settings in bloom

profile.title: Profile details
profile.description: Update your name and email by getting in touch with the bloom team

actions.title: Account actions
actions.description: Deleting your account will permanently erase your name, email address and the history of sessions you've watched from our system.

emailSettings.title: Email preferences
emailSettings.description: Update your email preferences here and changes will take effect immediately

checkbox.emailOnChange: Allow bloom to send me emails about changes to my account and my feedback
checkbox.emailOnCourse: Allow bloom to send me emails when there is a new course, language or service available

emailSettings.updateError: There was an error updating your Bloom account. Try again by refreshing this page, or <link>get in touch with the Bloom team.</link>
